item.title: Version 0.4.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.4.0

  • Plugin strip at bottom of main window with card-based UI and frosted glass material
  • Resizable plugin windows with proportional scaling
  • Instrument plugin UI moved from plugin strip to inspector panel
  • Mixer parameter automation support (volume, pan, mid/side)
  • On-demand full-resolution waveform loading for deep zoom
  • Apply fade in/out to all selected clips simultaneously
  • Zoom to fit clip when entering focus mode
  • Contextual grid opacity — subtle at rest, full during interactions
  • Piano roll ghost note preview now shows grid
  • Instant OOP plugin restore via offscreen parking
  • Smooth waveform rendering with adaptive anti-aliasing
  • Plugin strip panel caching for instant track switching
  • Resolved dark/light mode crashes and ghost plugin windows
  • Fixed Shift+click clip multi-selection accumulation
  • Fixed MIDI note grid alignment in arrangement clips
  • Eliminated data races in PlayheadCoordinator, SeamlessLoopPlayer, and StreamingTrackPlayer

item.title: Version 0.3.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.3.0

  • Per-track plugin windows with effect chain sidebar
  • Automatic Loudness Compensation (ALC) with K-weighted LUFS measurement
  • Seamless playback during clip moves
  • Waveform and MIDI preview in drop ghost during file drag
  • MCP server redesigned: consolidated from 23 to 8 tools, added MIDI editing and plugin management
  • Tempo-independent MIDI clips (durationBeats)
  • Bar selection expand/shrink (Cmd+Shift+. / Cmd+Shift+,)
  • Vertical zoom modes without requiring clip selection
  • Command palette pre-warmed for instant open
  • Swift 6 language mode migration
  • Borderless plugin windows with titlebar click-through
  • Stem splitter sample rate, memory, and waveform performance fixes
  • Fixed zero-length loop selection handling
  • Fixed stale hover states in sidebar during trackpad momentum scrolling
  • Fixed ghost note not clearing when CMD key released
  • Option key now bypasses grid snap when dragging MIDI notes

item.title: Version 0.2.8
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.8

  • Quantize Selection command (Cmd+U) snaps selected clips to the grid
  • Audio diagnostics for CPU load and glitch detection
  • Documentation link added to Help menu
  • Shortcuts remapped from § to mnemonic Option keys (e.g. ⌥E for effects)
  • Select All in Track (Cmd+A scoped to active track)
  • Clip gain now applied correctly to seamless loop buffer
  • Removed duplicate Zoom to Fit shortcut
  • Sandbox file access cleaned up with default folder support
  • Improved impulse pre-activation alignment for sidechain timing

item.title: Version 0.2.7
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.7

  • MCPB Desktop Extension for one-click Claude integration
  • MCP plugin parameter control tools with pagination support
  • Per-clip velocity editing with updated app icon
  • MIDI clip stamp mode with ghost note preview
  • Number keys set clip volume, Z/X for octave and slice-page navigation
  • Cmd+Shift+O bound to Open Recent Project by default
  • Sample-accurate sidechain timing with inline impulse rendering and loop-safe triggers
  • Waveform loading optimized with disk cache, vDSP, and parallelism
  • Grid lines update in real-time during pinch-to-zoom
  • Plugin windows no longer drop behind other apps when switching away
  • Keyboard shortcuts now route through plugin windows for transport control
  • Cmd-click stamp on sample track uses full sample duration instead of 1 bar
  • Cmd+click clip duplication now produces audio on playback
  • Clip colors update immediately when group color changes
  • File-dropped tracks no longer inherit group membership
  • Transient markers move with clip during drag in focus mode
  • Fixed marquee from clip selection using correct display track index
  • Instrument plugins restored correctly when loading a project
  • Instrument tracks included in offline bounce/export

item.title: Version 0.2.6
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.6

  • Compact track mode via Option-Up/Down for denser timeline views
  • Live dB readout during gain slider drag
  • Track color now used for selection highlight and drop ghost instead of system accent
  • Improved plugin transport timing with frame-position pointer and render-ahead compensation
  • Butter-smooth gain slider in focus mode via AppKit mouse tracking
  • Sample-accurate sidechain triggers moved to audio thread
  • Fixed waveform slice UV normalization in texture shader
  • Fixed sidebar selection text visibility when outline view loses focus
  • Corrected waveform amplitude display in normal timeline view

item.title: Version 0.2.5
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.5

  • Redesigned effects inspector with empty state, optimistic UI, and toggle
  • Multi-clip drag via marquee selection
  • Open Recent Project action in command palette
  • Sidebar items now select on mouseDown for faster response
  • Improved Add Task field UX with full-row click and keyboard passthrough
  • Fixed relative clip distances during multi-clip keyboard moves
  • Fixed marquee keyboard move glitches (selection, ghost trails, CALayer sync)
  • Fixed waveform loading shimmer artifacts after project load
  • Major performance improvements: fingerprint-based render skipping, structural update path, GPU bypass for keyboard moves

item.title: Version 0.2.4
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.4

  • Switched clip interaction from zone-based to CMD-modifier based
  • Added custom cursors for fade handles, timestretch, and creation mode
  • Implemented solo audio logic so soloed tracks are actually heard
  • Hide tracks from timeline with recursive group support
  • Smooth gain slider by moving gain to GPU and bypassing SwiftUI during drag
  • Smooth BPM stepper and swing slider performance
  • Fixed swing grid snapping and visual positions during drag
  • Fixed cursor display in audio focus mode

item.title: Version 0.2.3
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.3

  • Unified plugin category system with consistent icons
  • Non-activating plugin panels with automatic text editing detection
  • Simplified Key & Scale popover
  • Enlarged clickable area of transport info buttons (Key, BPM)
  • Improved timeline grid line visibility in dark mode
  • Fixed marquee vertical scroll direction
  • Filtered out modal dialog app hangs from Sentry reporting
  • Improved update error handling with guided instructions

item.title: Version 0.2.2
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.2

  • Fixed: Sparkle update dialog buttons now respond to clicks
  • Fixed: Event monitors no longer consume events from other windows

item.title: Version 0.2.1
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.1

  • Unified drag & drop for instruments and effects from the sidebar
  • Native sidebar lists for better performance
  • Auto-open instrument picker when creating instrument tracks
  • Fixed sidebar indentation and collapsible sections
  • Fixed clip drag ghost snapping
  • Fixed display tracks for grouped tracks

item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.0

  • Direct distribution outside App Store
  • Automatic updates via Sparkle
  • Crash reporting via Sentry
  • Move to Applications prompt for smoother installation
  • Removed sandbox restrictions for better AU plugin compatibility
